nodes.text: In 6 ABY, a New Republic task force was assembled to capture the Imperial held world of Borleias. It consisted of the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Emancipator, the bulk cruisers Corulag and Mon Valle, and the CR90 corvette Eridain. Starfighter support consisted of Rogue Squadron and Defender Wing, as well as eight assault shuttles including Modaran and Devonian.
